law.catch_line: An insurer or nonprofit health service plan that issues or delivers an individual, group, or blanket...

text.section: An insurer or nonprofit health service plan that issues or delivers an individual, group, or blanket health insurance policy or contract in the State may not exclude payments for blood products, both derivatives and components, that otherwise would be covered under the health insurance contract.
This section does not apply to whole blood or concentrated red blood cells.
